resources.string: Please select two or more images to swap

plurals.name: alert_delete
plurals.item: Are you sure you want to delete the %d selected image?
Are you sure you want to delete the %d selected images?

resources.string: Screen capture failed，Please allow background running

Stitch
Screenshot stitch helper
%1$s

  1. Tap Import/Screenshot to add images.
  2. In the screenshot mode, tap the float button to add screenshots, long press the button to open the editor.
  3. Tap the circle to select images to modify the stitching parameters, or drag the circle to move the images.
  4. Automatic stitching is powered by OpenCV, which can be used to stitch maps. Please ensure there is enough overlapping areas.
  5. Stitched data will be cleared after restart or tapping the quick button. Please export it as soon as you finish editing it.
Enjoy~

Stitch
Welcome to use the Screenshot stitch helper.
Stitch require the following permissions:
  1. Record the screen
    When taking screenshot, this permission will be requested to capture screenshot
  2. Display dropzone windows
    When taking screenshot, this permission will be requested to display float button
  3. Expand/Collapse system status bar
    When tap the quick tile button, this permission will be used to collapse system status bar
Please read the Privacy Policy carefully before using Stitch.

By clicking "Accept", you signify that you have read and agree to the above terms. We will obtain and use the permissions in accordance with the Privacy Policy, and will not collect and store any information without needed.
